abstract: Shares rose on the last day of October, which is on track to be the worst month for U.S. stocks since 1987.
snippet: Shares rose on the last day of October, which is on track to be the worst month for U.S. stocks since 1987.
lead_paragraph: October will go down as the worst month in the American stock market since 1987. Still, investors did not go out quietly.

headline.main: Stocks Higher on Last Day of Tumultuous Month
headline.print_headline: Roaring Month Goes Out Like a Lamb
